resources.string: This kind of color scheme chooses two opposite colors on the color wheel. It can create high contrast and catch people\'s eye. To enrich the color scheme, one or more colors can be chosen other than these two colors.

This kind of color scheme chooses several colors with the same hue and saturation as well as different lightness on the color wheel. It is a kind of safe color matching since most people will find it harmonious. It also needs to be noticed that it lacks contrast and is not that noticeable.

This kind of color scheme chooses several colors with similar hue on the color wheel. It can create the mood for the design, for example, red-orange-yellow creates the atmosphere of warmness and autumn, and green-aqua-blue creates the mood of coolness and water. Besides, it needs to be noticed that this color scheme also lacks contrast.

This kind of color scheme chooses three colors that are evenly-spaced and constructs a triangle on the color wheel. It can create high contrast and is very noticeable. It\'s a kind of color scheme giving people vivid feeling.
